comments.author: unnamed0simple
comments.body: Q2 2023:Mainnet LaunchCould you let me know the specific schedule?

comments.author: spacegrime
comments.body: Now appear a lot of new and prospective projects and it is necessary to discover their opportunities.

comments.author: Binity
comments.body: Quote from: spacegrime on March 06, 2023, 08:16:05 AMNow appear a lot of new and prospective projects and it is necessary to discover their opportunities.Now a lot of new projects appear on the market inspite the fall of the market. Also it is necessary to remember, that during the fall of the market there are the best opportunities to by the tokens for the best price and have the maximum profit from investment.

comments.author: Artik_Finance
comments.body: Quote from: Binity on March 06, 2023, 09:10:21 AMQuote from: spacegrime on March 06, 2023, 08:16:05 AMNow appear a lot of new and prospective projects and it is necessary to discover their opportunities.Now a lot of new projects appear on the market inspite the fall of the market. Also it is necessary to remember, that during the fall of the market there are the best opportunities to by the tokens for the best price and have the maximum profit from investment.How do you plan to promote the project during the fall of the market?

comments.author: Kaiba_Defi
comments.body: Quote from: Artik_Finance on March 07, 2023, 08:22:36 AMHow do you plan to promote the project during the fall of the market?Only during the fall of the market it is possible to buy tokens for the best price. Cryptocurrency market continue to develop even during the fall of the market. And it is necessary to monitor the market searching for new projects.

comments.body: Here is information how to earn money on airdroip.SatoshiChain Launches Incentivized Testnet and Airdrop Campaign - https://satoshichain.medium.com/satoshichain-launches-incentivized-testnet-and-airdrop-campaign-d89f86824caaRead it to know more about SatoshiChain

comments.body: Quote from: alan228 on March 11, 2023, 09:59:20 AMAirdrop is only the part of promotion. Also I saw an articles in media about the SatoshiChain that more people will know about the project and its benefits to people.Promotion is an important part of the development on every projects. Without promotion it is imposible to survive as every project needs comunity and promotion allows to attract comunity.
